name: City Car Transporter
description:
Enjoy your weekend with driving of Euro Transport Trailer 3D on big and busy city roads and jungle environments. Bring the adventure of new car transportation and transport woods from jungle to city wood cutter shop duty with 22 wheeler trailer. In Car & wood transport truck game the real adventure comes in when you drive and load 6 new modern cars and buggy on trailer, drive City Vehicle Transport Truck and deliver vehicles on showroom with in limited time in realistic Japanese and New York City environments. So drive carefully on city highway road and avoid hitting with other vehicles bus, car, bikes and passenger coaches.
If you never drive heavy lorry then learn how to drive and control monster cargo transporter trucks. Park truck on destination place and unload car with reverse gear and park carefully on desire location. Euro Transport Trailer 3D game is combination of two games with new cargo transport story transport vehicles from city to city and load woods log bundle from jungle and transport in the city. Enjoy the natural jungle and city environment.
Drive American truck and transporting robot vehicles is defiantly difficult but once you play this 3d cargo trailer game it will make you experience 4x4 cargo trailer driver simulator. This modern robot car simulator games will definitely give you the pro experience of driving multiple cars and heavy trucks.This Futuristic vehicle Transformation game will make you speechless. Multi levels cargo transportation game with outstanding steering and button controls with HD graphics.

Euro Transport Trailer 3D Features:

- Best and realistic cargo truck and different big trailers
- 10 Different challenging cargo aim levels
- Smooth steering control and pressure break of city transport vehicle
- Free 3D truck cargo transportation game
- Realistic simulation truck driving, parking and riding on city highway road
- Follow red arrow to reached on destination
- Transport vehicles and wood in different driving modes
- Interesting and classic background music
- Load vehicles and woods from different maps
